messages.message:
To unblock, you can update

```"libprotobuf=~3.21.12"

to 

libprotobuf```
in `webserver/webapp/Dockerfile:31`

This results in the below error for me
```  File "/instabase-server/py/manage_webapp.py", line 76, in <module>
    webapp.register_blueprints()
  File "/instabase-server/py/instabase/webapp/server/main.py", line 347, in register_blueprints
    self._register_apps()
  File "/instabase-server/py/instabase/webapp/server/main.py", line 367, in _register_apps
    from instabase.webapp.handler.views.apps import (
  File "/instabase-server/py/instabase/webapp/handler/views/apps/ocr.py", line 44, in <module>
    from instabase.ibdoc_to_json import ibdoc_to_json
ImportError: libprotobuf.so.32: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory```

Oh yes, I also had to remove the `from instabase.ibdoc_to_json import ibdoc_to_json` line from
`webserver/webapp/src/py/instabase/webapp/handler/views/apps/ocr.py:45`
to unblock. You can also switch off `USE_CPP_IBDOC_CONVERSION` I think. This is a temp workaround though.

> To unblock, you can update
We probably should update it regardless of this bug as we don't want to have hidden dependencies there
